item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with hats and songs. Lots of fun and insight about your personality and people in your life.

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is a personality types and Enneagram expert, having taught close to 2000 workshops on the Enneagram in the last 20 years. He is a therapist, personal life coach and author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, as well as Herb's Tips for Living.


7 to 10pm

Only $20

781 648 3737, herb@herbpearce.com, www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.why: Lots of people are coming and most are single! It's a great way to understand yourself, what personality types you are attracted to and how to relate to anyone more effectively to every type.
item.name: Enneagram Personality Types Workshop
